title: Marjayoun Governmental Hospital
description: Rehabilitation of morgue, warehouse and oxygen Tank at Marjayoun Governmental Hospital

title: Training Center at RHUH
description: Training Center Refit at Rafik Hariri University Hospital.

title: RHUH Shelter Construction
description: Construction of sand wall shelter (~250 m²) in RHUH basement 2 providing protected functional space.

title: Helicopter Steel Hangars – Lebarmy Hamat Airbase Phase
description: Construction of three new helicopter hangars at Hamat Airbase for the Lebanese Army, 68000 kg

title: Rehabilitation of ER Doors
description: Rehabilitation of Rafik Hariri University Hospital’s Emergency department doors by removing the old veneer, stainless steel, ironmongery, and replace them with new heavy duty and similar ones.

title: Emile Helou Police Station ISF Forensic LAB Renovation – Beirut - Lebanon
description: Structural & fit-out renovation including mezzanine steel platform for police forensic laboratory modernization.

title: Rehabilitation of Hotel Bathrooms inside the US Embassy Premises – Awkar - Beirut
description: Comprehensive bathroom infrastructure and finish upgrades within secure compound facilities.

title: North Basketball Court Rehabilitation-PRP Program- North Lebanon
description: Demolishing and Re-Construction of a Basketball Court at the Forum of The Handicapped as per International Standards funded by the ICRC

title: Hotel Monroe Aluminum Doors and Window Rehabilitation
description: Complete Rehabilitation of Doors and Windows following the Beirut Port Explosion

title: Baabdat Hills Villa
description: High end finishing works of a core & shell duplex villa in Baabdat.

title: Relocation of an Engagement Skills Training Simulator at Hamat Airbase – North Lebanon.
description: Earth works, Civil works, dismantling and reassembly of an EST shooting simulator within Hamat Airbase

title: Construction of New Cold Room
description: Supply and install a new cold room inside the Ministry of Defense's kitchen including insulated floor, walls, ceiling, refrigeration equipment, stainless steel stand and control panel.

title: Structural Rehabilitation works for the Ammunition Building in Riak Airbase – Bekaa Lebanon
description: Rehabilitation works pertaining to existing footings, columns and drop beams that were built by the French army in 1940’s and installation of new tie beams

title: 10 Fuel Tanks Network
description: Installation of new filling, vacuum and vent lines for ten fuel tanks in Batroun including civil works

title: Rehabilitation of Baabda Justice Palace Retention Center-Mount Lebanon
description: Rehabilitation of steel doors, paint, water network, Sewage Pumps, HVAC and construction of new room in Baabda JP Retention Center

title: Operation Theaters Vinyl Flooring at Nini Hospital-North Lebanon
description: Removal of old vinyl floor and tiles, install new tiles and Viny Floor Medical grade that serve 5 Operation Theaters.

title: Gandour Food Factory
description: Miscellaneous rehabilitation/improvement works inside Gandour factor: waterproofing, epoxy flooring, sanitary, civil works
